description: Modular AI system with individual AIs (Abraham, Moses, Jesus) and unified TrintityAI. Shared logic in ai-lib (CommonAI.py for monitoring, research, utils), unique data per AI in ./data/ (culture, archaeology, parables, OT fulfillment, ancient scrolls, language, customs). Servers on separate ports (5001-5003 for individual, 12345 for TrintityAI). C++ consoles query servers. Version control: MAJOR_VERSION, MINOR_VERSION, FIX_VERSION in files, printed as vX.Y.Z. All repos use consistent naming: main.py (console), NameAI_Server.py (server), NameAI_OS.py (desktop GUI), app.py (future mobile), NameAI_Console.cpp (C++ console), edit_data.cpp (C++ data editor).

project_outline.overview: The project is a family of Bible-based AIs, each specializing in a figure from Scripture (Abraham for faith/covenant, Moses for law/Exodus, Jesus for parables/fulfillment), unified in TrintityAI. Shared code in ai-lib ensures consistency in monitoring (RAM/CPU/disk/net), self-learning (research/update knowledge), logging, alerting, data handling. Each AI has unique ./data/ JSON files for deep knowledge (verses, archaeology, culture, language, customs). Self-learn triggers on 'learn [topic]', researching net and updating JSON. C++ tools for editing data and querying servers. Future: BDH/Pathway for advanced learning, phone app (app.py).
goals: Self-learning AIs that research and understand culture/language/customs.
Deep Bible knowledge (KJV, Greek, OT fulfillment).
Modular: Shared ai-lib, unique data per AI.

roadmap.v0.2.x: Basic servers, data loading, responses, voice.
roadmap.v0.3.x: Full self-learn, BDH/Pathway integration for core reasoning.
roadmap.v1.0: Desktop GUI (NameAI_OS.py), mobile (app.py), full ancient scrolls/OT fulfillment in data.
roadmap.future: Web deployment, real-time updates from GitHub, expanded parables/scrolls.

project_outline.connections: TrintityAI_Server.py queries individual servers (5001-5003) for combined responses. All import ai-lib/CommonAI.py for shared functions. Data unique per AI, edited via edit_data.cpp. Trackers in ai-lib (tracker.py, ai_tracker.db) log updates.

ai-lib.description: Central shared library for all AIs: CommonAI.py (monitoring, research, utils), tracker.py (DB tracking), monitoring.py (system limits), ai_tracker.db (SQLite DB for file tracking).

CommonAI.py.description: Core shared functions: logging, config load/save, system monitoring (RAM/CPU/disk/net), research (Wikipedia/GitHub API), alerting (email), data utils, version control.
CommonAI.py.connections: Imported by all AIs for shared monitoring/research/logging/alerting/data handling.

tracker.py.description: SQLite DB for tracking files/features/updates/connections across AIs.
key_functions: add_or_update_ai(name, url, major, minor, fix, features)
tracker.py.connections: Used in servers/main.py to log updates (e.g., on startup or version change).

ai_tracker.db.description: Database storing AI/file tracking data (ai_name, file_name, description, version, last_update, connections).
ai_tracker.db.connections: Populated by tracker.py; queried by servers for status.

ai-lib.links: Central shared repo; all other AIs import CommonAI.py, tracker.py, etc. Provides common monitoring, research, logging, alerting, data utils.

AbrahamAI.description: AbrahamAI: Focus on culture, journey, archaeology (Ur, Beer-sheba well), faith/covenant.

AbrahamAI_Server.py.description: Server for AbrahamAI queries, imports from ai-lib.
AbrahamAI_Server.py.connections: Imports CommonAI.py from ai-lib for shared functions; queries other AIs via TrintityAI.

main.py.connections: Uses data/abraham_data.json; can call server if networked.

AbrahamAI_Console.cpp.description: C++ console that queries AbrahamAI server.

AbrahamAI.links: Queries TrintityAI for unified mode; data unique to Abraham (culture, journey, archaeology).

MosesAI.description: MosesAI: Focus on law, Exodus route, tabernacle, plagues.

MosesAI_Server.py.connections: Imports from ai-lib; queried by TrintityAI.

MosesAI.links: Data unique to Moses (law, Exodus, tabernacle).

JesusAI.description: JesusAI: Focus on parables, Gospels Greek, OT fulfillment, archaeology.

JesusAI_Server.py.connections: Imports from ai-lib; queried by TrintityAI.

JesusAI.links: Data unique to Jesus (parables, Greek Gospels, OT fulfillment).

TrintityAI.description: Unified TrintityAI: Server queries individual AIs, GUI, console.

TrintityAI_Server.py.description: Server for TrintityAI queries, combines individual AIs.
TrintityAI_Server.py.connections: Queries AbrahamAI (5001), MosesAI (5002), JesusAI (5003); imports from ai-lib.

TrintityAI.links: Central hub; queries individual AIs; imports from ai-lib.

overall_project_notes: Shared logic in ai-lib/CommonAI.py (monitoring, research, utils). Unique data in each AI's ./data/ (culture, archaeology, parables, OT fulfillment). Servers on ports 5001-5003 (individual), 12345 (TrintityAI). C++ consoles query servers. Version control: MAJOR_VERSION, MINOR_VERSION, FIX_VERSION in files.
